meanings.definition: A garment covering the leg, typically tight-fitting.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite pair of leggins to keep warm.
meanings.sent2: Leggins are comfortable to wear during exercise.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to wear leggins but got tangled up in them.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a pair of leggins, always clinging on.
meanings.sent5: The bright red leggins stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A pair of leg coverings made of stretchy material, worn for exercise or fashion.
meanings.sent1: During yoga class, she always wears her trusty leggins.
meanings.sent2: Fashionable leggins can be found in various colors and patterns.
meanings.sent3: The penguin strutted around in leggins, trying to impress the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as flexible as a pair of stretchy leggins.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the leggins hugged her legs comfortably.
